Home.title: Hello, I'm Ludwing üëã, Full-Stack Web Developer
Home.subtitle: I specialize in creating innovative web solutions using a variety of technologies. My experience in the field has helped me hone my skills and tackle various challenges in web development.
Home.subtitle2: I have worked on system development from start to finish. From planning and database design to creating intuitive user interfaces and continuous deployment.
Home.service1Description: I build high-quality websites and mobile applications that fit your business needs. Whether you need to improve your online presence or develop a new app, I handle both the front-end and back-end.
Home.service2Description: I work to improve user experience with intuitive and effective designs. I research and design interfaces to ensure users enjoy a smooth and satisfying experience, increasing satisfaction and retention.
Home.service3Description: I provide support at every stage of the project, from requirements analysis and design to development, testing, and implementation. I ensure complete solutions tailored to your specific needs.
Home.subtitle3: Explore my projects, each created with passion and delivered on time, exceeding expectations.

Aboutme.title: Hello, I'm Ludwing üëã
Aboutme.subtitle: I am passionate about web development, with experience in front-end, back-end, and databases. I have worked on independent and collaborative projects, gaining skills across the entire development process. My learning has been largely self-taught, complemented by constant research and practice of new technologies. Through experimentation and solving different project challenges, I continue to enhance my skills and grow professionally.

ProjectPage.title: Projects
ProjectPage.description: Discover some of the projects I have been involved in. Each project has a detailed description and a sample image.
ProjectPage.textCard: My other projects are in private repositories. For more information, feel free to contact me.

project1.title: Web Application for Santa Rosita Pharmacy
project1.name: Santa Rosita Manager
project1.description: Application in development to optimize and manage the internal processes of the pharmacy, improving efficiency in inventory management, orders, and customer service.

project2.title: Web Application for the AstroboyXL Listening Party Event
project2.name: Astroboyxl.shop
project2.description: Web application for the AstroboyXL LISTENING PARTY event, for ticket purchases, user management, and purchasing exclusive products from the Trucho store.

project3.title: Mobile Web App for CEA
project3.name: App CEA
project3.description: Mobile web app for monitoring and tracking wild animals rescued by the CEA of the Autonomous Departmental Government of Santa Cruz.

project4.title: Landing Page of My First Professional Portfolio
